title: Postoperative pain in transabdominal preperitoneal laparoscopic hernia repair with staple fixation versus self-fixation mesh
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Carlos Eduardo Rey Chaves, Camilo Ramírez-Giraldo, Andrés Isaza-Restrepo, Danny Conde Monroy, Juliana González-Tamayo, Daniela Ayala, Maria Carolina Moreno Matson, Jorge Navarro-Alean
